SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the clockwise direction from Patent Commercialization Rate ?
SRP.A: The next dimension clockwise from Patent Commercialization Rate  is R&D ROI (Return on Investment)

SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the counterclockwise direction from Research Growth Rate?
SRP.A: The next dimension counterclockwise from Patent Commercialization Rate  is Research Growth Rate.

SRP.Q: On the Green Technology Adoption Rate Technology Transfer Success Rate, is the point for Price, Walsh and Wright Energy inside or outside the point for Campbell Group Neuroscience?
SRP.A: On the Green Technology Adoption Rate Technology Transfer Success Rate, the point for Price, Walsh and Wright Energy is inside the point for Campbell Group Neuroscience.

VPR.Q: Which label encloses the largest score in the radar chart?
VPR.A: label {Research Growth Rate} encloses the largest score

VPR.Q: What are the strongest and weakest dimension of Campbell Group Neuroscience?
VPR.A: The strongest aspect is {Research Growth Rate}, while the weakest aspect is{ Innovation Rate}.

VPR.Q: On dimension Innovation Rate, which label scores the highest?
VPR.A: On Innovation Rate, label {Campbell Group Neuroscience} scores the highest.

VPR.Q: On dimension Green Technology Adoption Rate Technology Transfer Success Rate, which label scores the highest?
VPR.A: On Green Technology Adoption Rate Technology Transfer Success Rate, label {Price, Walsh and Wright Energy} scores the lowest.

VE.Q: What is the value of Campbell Group Neuroscience on the Innovation Rate in the radar chart?

EVJ.A: The maximum value of Campbell Group Neuroscience across all dimensions is {32}.

EVJ.A: The minimum value of Price, Walsh and Wright Energy across all dimensions is {46}.

NC.Q: For Campbell Group Neuroscience, which dimension has a higher score: Interdisciplinary Collaboration Rate  or Citation Rate?
NC.A: {Interdisciplinary Collaboration Rate } has a higher score than Citation Rate for Campbell Group Neuroscience.

NC.Q: For Campbell Group Neuroscience, which dimension has a higher score: Research Growth Rate or Patent Commercialization Rate ?
NC.A: {Research Growth Rate} has a higher score than Patent Commercialization Rate  for Campbell Group Neuroscience.

NC.Q: On Citation Rate, which label has a higher score: Campbell Group Neuroscience or the Price, Walsh and Wright Energy?

NC.Q: On Research Growth Rate, which label has a higher score: Campbell Group Neuroscience or the Price, Walsh and Wright Energy?
NC.A: {Campbell Group Neuroscience} has a higher score on Research Growth Rate compared to Price, Walsh and Wright Energy.

MSR.Q: For Campbell Group Neuroscience, based on the data shown in the radar chart, which dimension does it most need to improve?
MSR.A: Campbell Group Neuroscience most needs to improve its {Innovation Rate}.

MSR.Q: In the radar chart, which label has the strongest overall capability across all labels?
MSR.A: The label with the strongest overall capability is {Campbell Group Neuroscience}.

MSR.Q: In the radar chart, which label has the weaknest overall capability across all labels?
